license: No explicit license stated by the hosting page; treated as a compilation of published H(z) measurements with per-row references.
citation: University of Bologna (cluster.difa.unibo.it) CC_data/data_CC.dat (cosmic chronometer H(z) compilation).
See references in the 4th column for original measurements.
notes: This release includes a reformatted CSV copy for deterministic execution.
If redistribution is a concern in a given jurisdiction, delete the local CSV and re-fetch from the source URL; the per-row references identify the original measurements.
